name: orpheus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in Greek mythology (= ancient stories), a poet who sang and played the lyre (= a musical instrument with a U-shaped frame and strings): Orpheus wanted to rescue his bride, Eurydice, from the underworld after she was bitten by a deadly snake.
